Text:
Confirmed, there is a virus in the patch.exe

Some lame generic Trojan horse.

Downloading...

...checking file...

...trojan found...

...trying to remove troyan...

...I'll be back...

R.I.P. ursak
... guess the trojan got him

Bah, theres trojans and then theres Trojans, almost every keygen, cracked exe-files or custom "credits"-files are detected as viruses by most antivirus software; But most of them are in fact quite harmless! I'd rather have 100 "trojans" in the form of keygens or whatever (less than 1mb a piece) than a "real" virus any day!
